COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
REQUIREMENTS    
UTME SUBJECTS  
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  
     Food and Nutrition, Home Economics/Home Management, 
Clothing and Textile, Agricultural Science/Biology.  
(iii) EDALV requires 'O' level credit passes in Biology and 
Chemistry.  
(iv) IAUED requires one (1) Science subject.  
(v) DELSU requires 'O' level credit passes in Biology, Home 
Economics and 'O' level pass in  
Mathematics/Chemistry.  
(vi) UYO requires 'O' level credit pass in Chemistry.  
(vii) LAGOS requires 'O' levelcredit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, Chemistry and any two (2) of  
Economics, Biology, Physics, Food and Nutrition/Home 
Management, Clothing and Textile, Garment  
Making/Dyeing and Bleaching/Catering Craft Practice.  
(viii) EBSU requires five (5)'O'level credit passes in English 
Language, Mathematics, and any three(3) of Biology, 
Chemistry, Physics, Food and Nutrition, Clothing and 
textile, Home Management.  
(ix) MAUTY requires TC Grade II or five (5) 'O' level credit 
passes in English, Mathematics., Home Economics and 
any two (2)of Management, Biology, Chemistry, and 
Clothing and Textiles  
(x) ABU requires five(5)'O’level credit passes  
Mathematics/EnglishLanguage/Home Economics, 
Biology, Geography, Physics/Chemistry.   
   Old Grade II   
   Five  (5)passes  including  Arithmetic/English  
Language/Domestic Science.   
   New Grade II Teachers Certificate  
 Five (5) credit passes including E nglish Language, 
Mathematics and Home Economics.
